data.title: OpenMPT Wiki
data.text:
libopenmpt[edit]

https://lib.openmpt.org/

Distribution packages[edit]

(As far as we know. If you know more, add it here.)

Alpine: https://pkgs.alpinelinux.org/packages?name=libopenmpt&branch=edge&repo=&arch=&maintainer=

Arch: https://archlinux.org/packages/?q=libopenmpt

Cygwin: https://cygwin.com/packages/summary/libopenmpt-src.html

Debian: https://tracker.debian.org/pkg/libopenmpt

Fedora: https://src.fedoraproject.org/rpms/libopenmpt

Fink: https://pdb.finkproject.org/pdb/package.php/libopenmpt-bin

FreeBSD: https://www.freshports.org/audio/libopenmpt/

Gentoo: https://packages.gentoo.org/packages/media-libs/libopenmpt

Haiku: https://depot.haiku-os.org/#!/pkg/libopenmpt

Homebrew: https://formulae.brew.sh/formula/libopenmpt

MacPorts: https://ports.macports.org/port/libopenmpt/

MSYS2: https://packages.msys2.org/base/mingw-w64-libopenmpt

NetBSD: https://cdn.netbsd.org/pub/pkgsrc/current/pkgsrc/audio/libopenmpt/index.html / https://pkgsrc.se/audio/libopenmpt

NixOS: https://search.nixos.org/packages?show=libopenmpt

OpenBSD: https://openports.pl/path/audio/libopenmpt

OpenEmbedded / Yocto: https://github.com/openembedded/meta-openembedded/tree/master/meta-multimedia/recipes-multimedia/libopenmpt

openSUSE: https://software.opensuse.org/package/libopenmpt

Slackware: http://sotirov-bg.net/slackpack/search.cgi?q=libopenmpt&lo=1 libopenmpt

Ubuntu: https://launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/libopenmpt

More packages with detailed version information may be found at Repology.

Software using libopenmpt[edit]

(As far as we know. If you know more, add it here. Please do not confuse libmodplug and libopenmpt when adding new software to this list. libmodplug is a different library.)

Players[edit]

Audacious (Linux, macOS, Windows): https://audacious-media-player.org/ (https://github.com/audacious-media-player/audacious-plugins/tree/master/src/openmpt)

Chipmachine Music Player (Linux, macOS, Windows): https://sasq64.github.io/chipmachine/

chiptune2.js (HTML5+JavaScript): https://github.com/deskjet/chiptune2.js

cmod3 (cross-platform (JavaScript+node-webkit)): https://github.com/jllodra/cmod3

Cog (kode54 fork) (macOS): https://cog.losno.co/

Droidsound (Android): https://github.com/droidmjt/Droidsound (note: Droidsound does not come under a free open source license)

foxbox (cross-platform Qt5): https://github.com/nilsding/foxbox

HippoPlayer (macOS, Windows, Linux): https://github.com/emoon/HippoPlayer

modizer (iOS): https://github.com/yoyofr/modizer

ModPlug Player (new version) (Windows, macOS, Linux): https://github.com/ModPlugPlayer/ModPlugPlayer

modplug-tools (Linux/*BSD command-line): https://github.com/alexmyczko/modplug-tools

mpd: https://github.com/MusicPlayerDaemon/MPD

openmpt123 (cross-platform command-line): https://lib.openmpt.org/

Pineapple Tracker Player: https://github.com/BLumia/pineapple-tracker-player

rePlayer (Windows): https://github.com/arnaud-neny/rePlayer

TrackMeister (Windows, Linux, macOS): https://github.com/kajott/TrackMeister

WACUP (Windows): https://getwacup.com/

Winamp (Desktop Version) (Windows): https://www.winamp.com/downloads/

ZXTune (Android, Linux, macOS, Windows): https://zxtune.bitbucket.io/

Player plugins[edit]

foobar2000 (foo_openmpt54): https://www.foobar2000.org/components/view/foo_openmpt54

Kodi (audiodecoder.openmpt): https://github.com/notspiff/audiodecoder.openmpt

qmmp (qmmp-openmpt): https://github.com/cspiegel/qmmp-openmpt

XMPlay (xmp-openmpt): https://lib.openmpt.org/ / https://www.un4seen.com/forum/?topic=15448.0

[edit]

asciimod (command-line tool to dump mod metadata): https://bitbucket.org/seece/asciimod/overview

Mod Library (module librarian for Windows): https://github.com/sagamusix/ModLibrary

Media framework plugins[edit]

ffmpeg (libopenmpt demuxer): https://ffmpeg.org/ / https://git.ffmpeg.org/gitweb/ffmpeg.git/blob/HEAD:/libavformat/libopenmpt.c / https://github.com/FFmpeg/FFmpeg/blob/master/libavformat/libopenmpt.c

gstreamer (openmptdec): https://gstreamer.freedesktop.org / https://cgit.freedesktop.org/gstreamer/gst-plugins-bad/tree/ext/openmpt / https://github.com/GStreamer/gst-plugins-bad/tree/master/ext/openmpt

Streaming software[edit]

demosauce (Streaming backend for Demovibes online radio platform): https://gitlab.com/maep/demosauce

Audio libraries[edit]

cl-mixed (Common Lisp): https://github.com/Shirakumo/cl-mixed

Cowbell (Javascript): https://github.com/demozoo/cowbell

node-chiptune (JavaScript / Node.js): https://github.com/Guichaguri/node-chiptune

SoLoud (C++, C): https://github.com/jarikomppa/soloud

tyrsound (C++, C): https://github.com/fgenesis/tyrsound

Game libraries / 3D engines[edit]

Godot: https://github.com/piptouque/godot_openmpt

Live performance frameworks[edit]

Modipulate (C++): https://github.com/MrEricSir/Modipulate Note: Modipulate uses a forked and patched version of libopenmpt.

Language bindings[edit]

C: https://lib.openmpt.org/

C++: https://lib.openmpt.org/

D: http://code.dlang.org/packages/dlibopenmpt

FreeBASIC: https://lib.openmpt.org/

Lua: https://github.com/konsumer/lua-openmpt

OCaml: https://github.com/demovibes/ocaml-openmpt

Ruby: https://rubygems.org/gems/ffi-openmpt

Rust: https://crates.io/crates/openmpt-sys / https://crates.io/crates/openmpt

Websites[edit]

keygenmusic.tk uses libopenmpt for their online module player: http://keygenmusic.tk/

ModArchive uses libopenmpt for their online module player: https://modarchive.org/
